5: 1 Ask your brother what time he came home yesterday.
1 What time did you come home yesterday?
2 Ask your friends where they will go tomorrow.
2 Where will you go tomorrow?
3 Ask your friend when he called you yesterday.
3 When did you call me yesterday?
4 Ask your brother what books he likes to read.
4 What books do you like to read?
5 Ask your mother where she will go next summer.
5 Where will you go next summer?
6 Ask your father where he went last year.
6 Where did you go last year?
7 Ask your sister who came to her in the evening.
7 Who came to you in the evening?
8 Ask your friend what she had for breakfast.
8 What did you have for breakfast?
9 Ask your mother how often she meets her friends.
9 How often do you meet your friends?
10 Ask your friend where he will go in the evening.
10 Where will you go in the evening?
11 Ask your sister why she didn't come at six.
11 Why didn't you come at six?
12 Ask your daughter whose book it is.
12 Whose book is it?
13 Ask your friend what kind of films she likes to watch.
13 What kind of films do you like to watch?
14 Ask your son what he wants to buy at the shop.
14 What do you want to buy at the shop?
15 Ask your sister why she didn't call you.
15 Why didn't you call me?
